LASERS.light_hint: Check box to indicate that this token is a light source
LASERS.mirror_hint: Check box to indicate that this token is a mirror
LASERS.sensor_hint: Check box to indicate that this token is a sensor.
LASERS.prism_hint: Check box to indicate that this token is a prism
LASERS.macro_hint: The macro to execute when the number of light-sources at this sensor changes
LASERS.ray_hint: The maximum lenth we trace a light ray, in grid cells
LASERS.matt_hint: Activate 'Monks Active Tile Triggers' on sensor change. Requires the MATT module installed.
LASERS.width_hint: Laser width as a fraction of the gridcell-size.
LASERS.debug_hint: Enable drawing of debug lines along the lightpaths, only works for one light at a time.
